AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: earnest gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a serious hard worker. Often [PAWN_possessive] co-workers say [PAWN_pronoun] doesn't socialize well.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: laid-back gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is not good at showing off his dignity or being hectic like a true hell guard. [PAWN_possessive] favorite time was skipping work, get tipsy, and sitting around mahjong table with the dead.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: careless gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a careless gokusotsu and cause of headache for Disaster Prevention Division. Whether [PAWN_pronoun] drunk or sober, [PAWN_nameDef] frequently fell and getting stuck in iron bamboo or slipping and falling into blood pond.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sensitive gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] hated [PAWN_possessive] workplace, as [PAWN_pronoun] could feel the grief and suffering of the dead souls. Other gokusotsu often mocked for [PAWN_nameDef]'s cringing behavior, but depending on the task, [PAWN_pronoun] could do delicate work that would make others groan.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: short-tempered gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is short-tempered. Where there is a fight, [PAWN_pronoun] is involved at a high rate.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clubber gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a jolly good-natured party-loving fellow.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gluttonous gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a glutton. [PAWN_pronoun] often ate the dead on the sly, causing a miscalculation of dead list.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: absentee gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was often absent from work or disappeared without permission, leaving [PAWN_possessive] post to the dead and go missing, which was frowned upon by others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nondrinker gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is not a big fan of alcoholic beverages. [PAWN_pronoun] was also not convinced by the fact that the dead who was an alcoholic before their death, were being punished in a dedicated section, while the gokusotsu themselves were drinking all the time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: nondrinker gokusotsu
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Although [PAWN_nameDef] was not a big fan of alcoholic beverages, [PAWN_pronoun] was always present at banquets to enjoy co-workers' cringy wasted behavior and off-the-record stories that [PAWN_pronoun] could use to succeed in life.
